You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Dcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0414/index.htm U+00414].
  * `&dcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0434/index.htm U+00434].
